International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the Proposed Credit (Additional Financing For Emergency 2007 Cyclone Recovery and Restoration Project) (Additional Financing II) to the People's Republic of Bangladesh. The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the People's Republic of Bangladesh (the Recipient) an additional credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 91,100,000. The purpose of of the Project is to assist the Recipient to facilitate recovery from the damage to livelihoods and infrastructure caused by Cyclone Sidr and to build long-term preparedness through strengthened disaster risk reduction and management. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such an additional credit and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the additional credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the People's Republic of Bangladesh, and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the People's Republic of Bangladesh.
